spec.name: Twin Towers Center
spec.description: The Twin Center (Tours Jumelles de Casablanca) is a major commercial and business complex consisting of two high-rise towers. Built in the late 1990s and early 2000s, they were, for a time, the tallest buildings in Morocco. The Twin Center symbolizes Casablanca's aspiration as a modern global business hub and houses offices, commercial space, and a hotel. Their distinctive height and location in the Ma√¢rif district make them the most recognizable landmarks of the modern city skyline.

people.comment: Spanish architect responsible for the architectural design (Requires external verification).

timeline.title: Completion and Opening
timeline.description: The Twin Towers complex was completed and opened.
